recipe.title: Szechuan Sesame Noodles
ingredients: 8 ounces thin dried Asian noodles or linguine
2 tablespoons finely chopped peeled fresh ginger
1 1/2 cups thinly sliced green or red onions
instructions: Cook noodles in large pot of boiling salted water until tender but still firm to bite. Drain; return noodles to same pot. Mix in 1 tablespoon oil and peanuts. Heat 3 tablespoons oil in heavy small skillet over medium-low heat. Add ginger and garlic; stir 10 seconds. Add teriyaki sauce, lime juice and chili sauce; simmer 30 seconds. Mix sauce and onions into noodles. Season with salt and pepper. Serve warm or at room temperature.
